scripts.db:compile: npx tsc utils/supabase/database-manager.ts --outDir scripts --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:compile && node scripts/db.js setup
scripts.db:info: npm run db:compile && node scripts/db.js info
scripts.db:fix: npm run db:compile && node scripts/db.js fix
scripts.db:setup-small: npm run db:compile && node scripts/advanced-db-setup.js small
scripts.db:setup-medium: npm run db:compile && node scripts/advanced-db-setup.js medium
scripts.db:setup-large: npm run db:compile && node scripts/advanced-db-setup.js large
scripts.db:setup-realistic: npm run db:compile && node scripts/advanced-db-setup.js realistic
scripts.db:setup-custom: npm run db:compile && node scripts/advanced-db-setup.js custom
scripts.db:challenge-light: npm run db:compile && node scripts/challenge-db-setup.js light
scripts.db:challenge-medium: npm run db:compile && node scripts/challenge-db-setup.js medium
scripts.db:challenge-heavy: npm run db:compile && node scripts/challenge-db-setup.js heavy
scripts.db:challenge-custom: npm run db:compile && node scripts/challenge-db-setup.js custom
